meanings.definition: A systematic plan or course of action
meanings.sent1: Following the regimens in the schedule helped me stay organized.
meanings.sent2: The military has strict regimens for training new recruits.
meanings.sent3: The regimens for cleaning my room involve a lot of steps!
meanings.sent4: Her daily regimens were like a well-oiled machine, never missing a beat.
meanings.sent5: The regimens for success include hard work and dedication.

meanings.definition: A prescribed course of medical treatment, diet, or exercise
meanings.sent1: The doctor recommended a strict regimen of medication for the patient.
meanings.sent2: She followed the prescribed regimen to improve her health.
meanings.sent3: The regimen of eating broccoli every day seemed like a punishment!
meanings.sent4: His fitness regimen was the key to his recovery after surgery.
meanings.sent5: The prescribed regimen of rest and relaxation helped her recover quickly.

meanings.definition: A set of rules or guidelines for behavior or practice
meanings.sent1: The school has strict regimens for student conduct.
meanings.sent2: Following the regimens of etiquette is important in formal settings.
meanings.sent3: The regimens for playing the game were confusing at first.
meanings.sent4: The regimens of the ancient tradition were passed down for generations.
meanings.sent5: She found comfort in the regimens of her daily routine.
